 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֶ֫זֶג‎</span>] **noun masculine** ==mixture==, i.e. ==mixed wine== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Aramaic, and thence <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִזְנָא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְזִיגָא‎</span>; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***water mixed with wine, mixture*** ([[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>l.c</sup>.), compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַליֶֿחְסַר הַמָּ֑זֶג‎</span> [[Song.7.3|Song 7:3]] (Tosafoth here ***spiced wine:*** compare [[BDB#Levy|Levy]]<sup>NHWB iii. 61</sup>).
